1.7.0

1.7.0 (April 23, 2018)

New features

  • [e983b85e4d] - New: Support to set the formatter via CLI (by Shyju / see also: #888).

1.6.1 (April 14, 2018)

Bug fixes / Improvements

  • [459a958155] - Docs: Fix image links and sizes (by Jesus David García Gomez / see also: #1006).

1.6.0 (April 10, 2018)

Bug fixes / Improvements

  • [c47bc723be] - Fix: Update npm-registry-fetch to v3.1.1 (by Cătălin Mariș / see also: #994).

New features

  • [78893e7fb2] - New: Add after/before support to local tests runner (by Jesus David García Gomez).

1.5.0 (April 10, 2018)

Bug fixes / Improvements

  • [6163e3a7ad] - Fix: Remove web app manifest related code (by Cătălin Mariș).
  • [e543db47fb] - Docs: Remove/change “just [insert any task here]” (by Cătălin Mariș / see also: #939).
  • [57632ae5e8] - Docs: Fix typo in configurations.md (by Aaron Wentzel / see also: #983).
  • [c62ad58e24] - Docs: Update event related information (by Cătălin Mariș).

New features

  • [a539944f18] - New: Add support for extends on applicable config parsers (by Jesus David García Gomez / see also: #943).
  • [156009de1e] - New: Add asyncTry util (by Jesus David García Gomez).
  • [7424564129] - New: Update iltorb to v2.2.0 (by Cătălin Mariș).

1.4.0 (March 27, 2018)

Bug fixes / Improvements

  • [e77c041b38] - Docs: Update parser related event information (by Cătălin Mariș).

New features

  • [616d82b4f9] - New: Move ajv related logic into a new util in sonarwhal (by Jesus David García Gomez / see also: #929).
  • [e5bc8f283b] - New: Add Brotli support to requester (by Antón Molleda / see also: #735).

1.3.1 (March 24, 2018)

Bug fixes / Improvements

  • [ad77355179] - Fix: Update --new-rule process (by Jesus David García Gomez / see also: #857).

1.3.0 (March 23, 2018)

New features

  • [e19d413edc] - New: Support fetchContent in local connector (by Jesus David García Gomez).

1.2.2 (March 22, 2018)

Bug fixes / Improvements

  • [e3be5b9aa9] - Fix: Add development category (by Antón Molleda).

1.2.1 (March 22, 2018)

Bug fixes / Improvements

  • [f679ad4181] - Fix: Infinite loop when running the --init command (by Jesus David García Gomez / see also: #908).

1.2.0 (March 20, 2018)

Bug fixes / Improvements

  • [f20ca70df9] - Fix: Install packages as sonarwhal was installed (by Qing Zhou / see also: #868).
  • [0704ed5bfd] - Docs: Fix aXe link from FAQ.md (by Cătălin Mariș / see also: #899).

New features

  • [7edd85baf5] - New: Add text/plain media type to getType (by Cătălin Mariș).

1.1.0 (March 15, 2018)

New features

  • [1f30ec2d72] - New: Define media type for rc config files.

Bug fixes / Improvements

  • [ad126251d6] - Fix: Remove unused options in CLI help (see also: #886).

  • [37fb863f80] - Fix: Issue when no configuration file exists (see also: #876).

1.0.1 (March 12, 2018)

1.0.0 (March 9, 2018)

Bug fixes / Improvements

  • [30579567c3] - Fix: Dependencies and scripts for --new-rule.
  • [af07cd0b1f] - Fix: Init wizard when using a configuration.
  • [366e833121] - Fix: Improve init wizard.

New features

  • [d0d18917e0] - New: Search for .sonarwhalrc in user’s homedir (see also: #718).
  • [09fb512397] - New: Add optional parameter target to formatters.
  • [e3b097b06f] - New: Optional param packageName in getRuleName.

0.28.0 (March 6, 2018)

New features

  • [5cde8da7eb] - New: Support configuration rules in global.

  • [188d270f03] - New: Make no-disallowed-headers allow by default the Server HTTP header (see also: #747).
